QuestData.Title: Report to General Kirika
QuestData.Description: You must be one of General Kirika's new recruits. It's about time you showed up. Bodies wear down quick in the desert.$b$bThe dwarves have been getting reinforcements daily, and we can't afford to lose ground in our struggle for resources in Silithus.$b$bGet your instructions from the General. It's not my job to train you, just find you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with General Kirika at the Horde encampment near Hive'Regal.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good that you're here, but there's no time to waste making small talk. You need instructions, and then you need to get out there.$b$bListen up.
